name: Blockluster (itch)
description:
I've made this game as an lesson for our morals as humans (Monsters) where we look for war and few look for love. for our beloved Syria and any other country that has been destroyed by filth and malice.... spread love because only the unloved hate.

This game was an entry for LudumDare 33 (theme: You're the monster)

solo jam .
